text: Tristania is a gothic metal band from Norway. The band was created by Morten Veland. ==Style== The album Widow's Weeds (1998) is a mix of gothic rock, gothic metal and doom metal. The album Beyond the Veil (1999) is a mix of gothic metal and doom metal. The album World of Glass (2001) is a mix of gothic rock, gothic metal, alternative rock, symphonic metal and folk metal. Category:Death metal bands Category:Doom metal bands Category:Gothic metal bands Category:Norwegian heavy metal bands Category:Stavanger
title: Tristania
